title: Superdoctor
author: Superdoctor
content: I invested in ethereum when it was $700 in 2020 and in 2021 when it was $4000 I sold it. I just  bought again now that the value has reduced. I still trust that it will increase rapidly soon.

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Quote from: Superdoctor on June 26, 2022, 09:13:11 AMI invested in ethereum when it was $700 in 2020 and in 2021 when it was $4000 I sold it. I just  bought again now that the value has reduced. I still trust that it will increase rapidly soon.It's pretty clear that you're just a spammer. I mean, how else to explain this statement of yours from last year: Quote from: Superdoctor on September 15, 2021, 01:10:18 PMI choose bitcoin. I lost money buying alt coins. I will not repeat the same mistake

comments.author: Superdoctor
comments.body: Quote from: decodx on June 26, 2022, 11:16:27 AMQuote from: Superdoctor on June 26, 2022, 09:13:11 AMI invested in ethereum when it was $700 in 2020 and in 2021 when it was $4000 I sold it. I just  bought again now that the value has reduced. I still trust that it will increase rapidly soon.It's pretty clear that you're just a spammer. I mean, how else to explain this statement of yours from last year: Quote from: Superdoctor on September 15, 2021, 01:10:18 PMI choose bitcoin. I lost money buying alt coins. I will not repeat the same mistake yes I lost a lot of money buying alt coins but read and understand my topic. It’s stated clearly that the alt coin I trust the most is ethereum due to the losses I’ve incurred in investing in other alt coins. The only trusted alt coins for me is ethereum. I hope you understand better now?

comments.author: Kemarit
comments.body: Quote from: Superdoctor on June 26, 2022, 09:13:11 AMI invested in ethereum when it was $700 in 2020 and in 2021 when it was $4000 I sold it. I just  bought again now that the value has reduced. I still trust that it will increase rapidly soon.I guess Ethereum is one solid altcoin to begin with, it's the prime mover so most likely in the next bull run it will grown again. And I think this is the best time to buy them again, although it is still above 4 digit but the potential growth in 2024-2025 might be huge. And not just Ethereum, perhaps the top 5-10 altcoins will eventually bounce back and as others have said, bear market is the best time to buy and hold.

comments.author: Jackl87
comments.body: Quote from: Superdoctor on June 26, 2022, 09:13:11 AMI invested in ethereum when it was $700 in 2020 and in 2021 when it was $4000 I sold it. I just  bought again now that the value has reduced. I still trust that it will increase rapidly soon.Seems like you hit the timings pretty well with your buys and sells of Ethereum. Gratulations to that. You sold it pretty close to it's all time high which is always a great feeling afterwards. I would also say that Ethereum is probably the altcoin that i have the most trust in. Both in terms of general trust into the project itself and in the team behind it and of course also trust that Ethereum will remain to be the most important altcoin of them all also in the mid- and long term future. Therefore i think it is totally reasonable to invest into Ethereum now especially if you plan on holding again for a few years or so.

comments.author: CuriousGeorge
comments.body: So, have you been moving from bitcoin to the ethereum? why are you still trusting altcoins after you have gotten a huge lose? ethereum was also altcoin as well. Ethereum may increase again when bitcoin will be increasing first. If bitcoin is still remain in the bearish trend and how can ethereum to be bullish like what already happened in the past? Ethereum is waiting for the market trend to turn to be bullish trend again and you may see that level again when you sold your ethereum at 4k USD.This may happen in long term.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Quote from: Superdoctor on June 26, 2022, 09:13:11 AMI invested in ethereum when it was $700 in 2020 and in 2021 when it was $4000 I sold it. I just  bought again now that the value has reduced. I still trust that it will increase rapidly soon.Sounds like you know how to play the game dude. Too many people do the total opposite & sell on the way down, buy on the way up. ETH is definitely still a good investment & now is a good time to buy again. You might even get a chance to buy under $1,000 before the next bull run starts.

comments.author: tbct_mt2
comments.body: Quote from: Superdoctor on June 26, 2022, 09:13:11 AMI invested in ethereum when it was $700 in 2020 and in 2021 when it was $4000 I sold it. I just  bought again now that the value has reduced. I still trust that it will increase rapidly soon.You are genius newbie. I congratulate for your big profit honestly.When I was a newbie, I believed Bitcoin will rise to $100k and did not sell it in 2017 so you actually are better than me, knew where is peak to take profit and did not hope too high.My trusted altcoins: Ethereum, BNB, Dogecoin and the gold token (the signature I wear). Gold token is backed by real physical gold bars in vaults (Bullion Stars in Singapore).

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: Superdoctor on June 26, 2022, 09:13:11 AMI invested in ethereum when it was $700 in 2020 and in 2021 when it was $4000 I sold it. I just  bought again now that the value has reduced.Nice, that's real profit there and you did a good job of selling at the top and buying again when it's low. There's no catch with that and you just did the right thing and the typical suggestion and tip that we're telling about buying low and selling high.Quote from: Superdoctor on June 26, 2022, 09:13:11 AMI still trust that it will increase rapidly soon.Me too, let's just keep holding Ethereum together.

comments.author: Sterbens
comments.body: Ethereum is an altcoin that is definitely a better one to invest in. Ethereum goes with Bitcoin's journey in ups and downs. If you own Ethereum and stay focused on investing long term I think it's quite relevant and won't worry you as long as you keep your focus on putting money into Bitcoin. The advantage is clear that the two coins you hold can guarantee long-term profits.

comments.author: GbitG
comments.body: When we hear the word of altcoins the first thing come in my mind is Ethereum . Ethereum is the coin which lead all altcoins from start so the altcoin which I trust 100% is the one and only Ethereum (ETH) because I believe if you even bought it at 4k$ it will never disappoint you because if you hold it for 3 to 4 year I believe that it can double or may be triple you investment  because the adoption of Ethereum Blockchain is increasing rapidly which will be very significant for Ethereum price growth.

You might even get a chance to buy under $1,000 before the next bull run starts.Ethereum I think is always a good choice for investment and that's without a doubt for sure,now is the right moment to buy and we need to make the most of it,then continue to hold and wait until the market is bullish

comments.author: yurez
comments.body: Quote from: Superdoctor on June 26, 2022, 09:13:11 AMI invested in ethereum when it was $700 in 2020 and in 2021 when it was $4000 I sold it. I just  bought again now that the value has reduced. I still trust that it will increase rapidly soon.In my opinion, investing in only one altcoin is not a good decision. It is better to diversify free funds into several altcoins from the top-50. If you invest for a long time, then it is better to definitely buy Ethereum, since the risk of a scam and a complete depreciation is minimal.

comments.author: 8rch7
comments.body: Quote from: Superdoctor on June 26, 2022, 09:13:11 AMI invested in ethereum when it was $700 in 2020 and in 2021 when it was $4000 I sold it. I just  bought again now that the value has reduced. I still trust that it will increase rapidly soon.Nice investment bought ethereum on $700 and sell later above $4,000 and most profitable you earn, but how much price buy back ethereum again? if you still buy above $3,000 still need waiting recovery because ethereum have drop under $1,300 right now. I think not mistake if you bough ethereum on higher price because drastically dump from bitcoin last year make all altcoin price drop and ethereum have lower price until now. Not have to worry if ethereum really drop and have chance back to higher price later until make new all time high above $5,000 on several years later.

comments.author: reza7777
comments.body: steady, because you buy at the right time and so when you sell it, choosing ethereum again as a long-term investment is no doubt by anyone. looks like you understand enough about the game in crypto

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Quote from: Superdoctor on June 26, 2022, 11:31:57 AMyes I lost a lot of money buying alt coins but read and understand my topic. It’s stated clearly that the alt coin I trust the most is ethereum due to the losses I’ve incurred in investing in other alt coins. The only trusted alt coins for me is ethereum. I hope you understand better now? I have news for you, ethereum IS altcoin! I hope you understand better now. Besides, I thought you said last year, "I choose bitcoin."  Idiot spammer ... Welcome to my ignore list.

comments.author: MArsland
comments.body: Quote from: Superdoctor on June 26, 2022, 05:30:01 PMYeah ethereum is the best altcoin so far. A friend of mine is  researching about BNB and EOS. Do you think they are good coins to invest in?All altcoins can be considered good when they are profitable, but if they are not, they will be labeled as goddamn coins and make them non-profitable coins. As long as we know when to enter to buy and take profits then do it. But you need to remember that dividing your portfolio balance into many altcoins is also not good. So just take one or 2 altcoins that you have chosen such as Ethereum.

comments.author: NewRanger
comments.body: Quote from: Superdoctor on June 26, 2022, 09:13:11 AMI invested in ethereum when it was $700 in 2020 and in 2021 when it was $4000 I sold it. I just  bought again now that the value has reduced. I still trust that it will increase rapidly soon.thats good investment dude, sell in profit and then rebuy when it drop.ethereum as main smart contract platform has huge liquidity in market  so it wont be problem although current price has high volatility. More opportunity appear when ethereum price drop more. Whales or retail investor will buy it.

comments.author: AmoreJaz
comments.body: Quote from: NewRanger on June 26, 2022, 09:03:29 PMQuote from: Superdoctor on June 26, 2022, 09:13:11 AMI invested in ethereum when it was $700 in 2020 and in 2021 when it was $4000 I sold it. I just  bought again now that the value has reduced. I still trust that it will increase rapidly soon.thats good investment dude, sell in profit and then rebuy when it drop.ethereum as main smart contract platform has huge liquidity in market  so it wont be problem although current price has high volatility. More opportunity appear when ethereum price drop more. Whales or retail investor will buy it.the good thing about eth network is it is being developed by solid team headed by vitalik. in my opinion, this group will continue to innovate and offer better services to the crypto community. unlike most dev teams that are after for quick gains, this team is really thinking the future of their platform. the outcome of their developments may be slow but i don't think they are just sleeping on their targets. this is why, even if it drops its price, the probability of gaining again is very high once the market recovers. what the OP did was a smart one. get his profits while he can.
